InternalServerError.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred while processing the request.

status.description: Indicates whether the request was unsuccessful.

message.description: A brief description of the error, if any.
message.example: Internal Server Error occurred while processing the request.

error.description: Additional information about the error, if available.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code indicating an unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.
